item.title: Help wit making myself admin
item.dc:creator: @who_run_it who run it
item.description:
@who_run_it wrote:

search for that top line and where it says “cashville” you put your username in that spot and the player rights 3 means owner but DONT copy and paste that code to your client thats just an example

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Cashville”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mag3r boy54”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin kyle”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkd u alredy”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“taco”))
{[/code]
